mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board (idx, author, parent_board_idx, title, password, hit, content, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{idx}, #{author}, #{parentBoardIdx}, #{title}, #{password}, #{hit}, #{content}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt})
mapper.select: WITH RECURSIVE reply_tree AS ( SELECT idx, parent_board_idx, title, author, content, hit, created_at, updated_at, 1 AS level FROM board WHERE parent_board_idx = #{parentIdx} UNION ALL SELECT b.idx, b.parent_board_idx, b.title, b.author, b.content, b.hit, b.created_at, b.updated_at, rt.level + 1 FROM board b JOIN reply_tree rt ON b.parent_board_idx = rt.idx WHERE rt.level < 2 ) SELECT * FROM reply_tree ORDER BY level, created_at
